snippet: More than 100 same-sex couples gathered early at the Boise courthouse on Wednesday and counted down the seconds before the clerk’s office opened to issue marriage licenses, as Idaho became the latest state to recognize gay marriage.
abstract: More than 100 same-sex couples gather early at Boise, Idaho, courthouse and count down the seconds before clerk’s office opens to issue marriage licenses, as state becomes latest to recognize gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 same-sex couples gathered early at the Boise courthouse on Wednesday and counted down the seconds before the clerk’s office opened to issue marriage licenses, as Idaho became the latest state to recognize gay marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
